Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/analysis/statistics/Descriptive
Synopsis Descriptive Statistics.
Details geometricMean kurtosis max mean median min percentile skewness standardDeviation sum sumsq variance
Description Provides the following univariate (single variable) statistics functions:

  • geometricMean:
  • kurtosis:
  • max:
  • mean:
  • median:
  • min:
  • percentile:
  • skewness:
  • standardDeviation:
  • sum:
  • sumsq:
  • variance:
Examples 
rascal>import analysis::statistics::Descriptive;
ok
rascal>D = [67, 88, 55, 92.5, 102, 51];
list[num]: [67,88,55,92.5,102,51]
rascal>mn = min(D);
num: 51.0
rascal>mx = max(D);
num: 102.0
rascal>range = mx - mn;
num: 51.0
rascal>midrange =  mn + range/2;
num: 76.5
rascal>sum(D);
num: 455.5
rascal>mean(D);
num: 75.91666666666667
rascal>geometricMean(D);
num: 73.3734107237499
rascal>standardDeviation(D);
num: 21.162269884553183
rascal>variance(D);
num: 447.8416666666666
rascal>percentile(D,25);
num: 54.0
rascal>percentile(D,50);
num: 77.5
rascal>percentile(D,75);
num: 94.875
